https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2NOmJWoZb45IhKpF8y4FIuvEh4y.jpg In a bed at a treatment centre, a severely disabled boy lies. Nobody understands him. Everybody has given him up, except for one person. A warm film about the fact that solutions are not always the solution. Closework
